contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas is affirmed. See, Marshall v. Port Authority of Allegheny County, 524 Pa. 1, 568 A.2d 931 (1990); Feingold v. Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority, 512 Pa. 567, 517 A.2d 1270 (1968).
NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
LARSEN and PAPADAKOS, JJ., file dissenting opinions.
